newsitem.title: UK: MEPC falls with drop in net asset value.
newsitem.headline: MEPC falls with drop in net asset value.

text.p: Shares in British property group MEPC Plc slipped on Thursday after the company announced pretax profits -- which beat most analyst expectations -- but also a fall in net asset value (NAV) per share.
The shares fell 12-1/2p to 440p by 0822 in pre-market trade.
Full year pretax profits came in at 140 million stg, beating analysts forecasts of between 125.1-135.1 million stg. The dividend was raised to 20 pence per share, as expected.
But analysts said the drop in net asset value per share, to 450 pence from 457 pence was disappointing.
